actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to provide that the repeal of the 3-year basis recovery rule applicable to employees' annuities apply only to individuals whose annuity starting date is more than 90 days after the enactment of this Act.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to provide that the repeal of the three-year basis recovery rule applicable to employees' annuities shall apply only to individuals whose annuity starting date is more than 90 days after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to provide that the repeal of the 3-year basis recovery rule applicable to employees' annuities apply only to individuals whose annuity starting date is more than 90 days after the enactment of this Act.
